summary:
Joseph was a significant character in the Book of Genesis and the Quran. As Jacob's favorite son, his jealous brothers sold him into slavery in Egypt. Despite this, Joseph rose to power by interpreting the Pharaoh's dreams. He helped Egypt through a famine and later welcomed his family there to escape the same famine.

Joseph's story explains why Israelites lived in Egypt. He is also associated with the future "Mashiach ben Yosef" in Jewish tradition, who will fight against evil.
title: Joseph (Genesis)
